title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 891.3 - Renewals that do not require affirmative action by municipality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 891.3 - Renewals that do not require affirmative action by municipality

State Regulations

If an existing franchise contains an option to renew in
favor of the franchisee, the franchisee may seek commission approval for a
renewal pursuant to said option provided that the option is timely exercised
and an application to the commission is made within 30 days thereof. An option
to renew may not be exercised by the franchisee sooner than 36 months prior to
the expiration of the existing franchise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
891.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
